title: Increase gameplay screen size for larger playfield display

requirements.text: Increase the Snake game playfield canvas size significantly so it occupies more screen space and is noticeably larger than the current small centered display, making the gameplay area more prominent and comfortable to play on desktop and mobile devices.

quotes: Game play display be large not small

acceptanceCriteria: The playfield canvas renders significantly larger than the current small size
The gameplay area is prominent and comfortable to view on desktop screens
The canvas remains responsive and appropriately sized on mobile devices
The larger canvas does not cause layout issues with the HUD or control legend

constraints: Maintain responsive behavior across desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes
Preserve the square aspect ratio of the playfield
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts
Keep the graph/grid styling consistent in any unavoidable unused areas around the playfield
nonGoals: Changing the game controls or input handling
Modifying the visual theme or color scheme
Changing the gameplay mechanics or snake movement
